title: From the total FSI available under Clause 6, entire FSI towards rehabilitation component and MHADA's share shall have to be utilized on plot/plots under the Scheme
clause_text: From the total FSI available under Clause 6, entire FSI towards rehabilitation component and MHADA's share shall have to be utilized on plot/plots under the Scheme. In case a part of incentive FSI is not proposed to be utilized on the same plot, the benefit of TDR as per
